solution_line_template: First find the total time Aron spends vacuuming: {vacuuming_minutes_per_day} minutes/day * {vacuuming_days_per_week} days/week = <<{vacuuming_minutes_per_day}*{vacuuming_days_per_week}={total_vacuuming_minutes_per_week}>>{total_vacuuming_minutes_per_week} minutes/week

Then find the total time Aron spends dusting: {dusting_minutes_per_day} minutes/day * {dusting_days_per_week} days/week = <<{dusting_minutes_per_day}*{dusting_days_per_week}={total_dusting_minutes_per_week}>>{total_dusting_minutes_per_week} minutes/week

Then add those two times to find Aron's total cleaning time per week: {total_vacuuming_minutes_per_week} minutes/week + {total_dusting_minutes_per_week} minutes/week = <<{total_vacuuming_minutes_per_week}+{total_dusting_minutes_per_week}={total_cleaning_minutes_per_week}>>{total_cleaning_minutes_per_week} minutes/week
